member.name: M:Amazon.AmplifyBackend.AmazonAmplifyBackendClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonAmplifyBackendClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
